title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.25 - Consumption or possession of alcoholic beverages in certain vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.25 - Consumption or possession of alcoholic beverages in certain vehicles

State Regulations

The drinking of alcoholic beverages, or the possession of an
open container containing an alcoholic beverage, in a vehicle located upon a
terminal highway is prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1152.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
